At present , e-cigarettes become increasingly popular among smoker worldwide . However , knowledge e-cigarette nicotine pharmacology remain limited . The aim study 1 ) determine pharmacokinetics nicotine multiple dose administration electronic cigarette 2 ) compare acute effect multiple dose nicotine administrate electronic cigarette compare obteined cigarette .
